actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount of a loan that the Secretary of Commerce may guarantee from 75 percent of 87.5 percent of the cost of certain vessels, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for an increase in the amount of a loan that the Secretary of Commerce may guarantee under the Merchant Marine Act of 1936 from 75 percent to 87.5 percent of the cost of certain vessels.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount of a loan that the Secretary of Commerce may guarantee from 75 percent of 87.5 percent of the cost of certain vessels, and for other purposes.
